Detailed Description

Implements traditional and TriAx weight-mapped mesh binding.

This class provides access to and manages weight-maps associated with mesh binding. This class is not intended to be constructed directly, rather, it is created automatically by DzFigure. Create an instance of DzFigure, populate it with a DzFacetMesh-derived geometry, and request its skin-binding to access this class.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzSkinBinding::NormalizeType

Enumerated options for which maps to normalize.

Enumerator:
NormalizeNone 

No maps are normalized.

NormalizeX 

Only X-axis rotation maps are normalized.

NormalizeY 

Only Y-axis rotation maps are normalized.

NormalizeZ 

Only Z-axis rotation maps are normalized.

NormalizeGeneral 

Only the general maps are normalized.

NormalizeScale 

Only the scale maps are normalized.

NormalizeWeight 

All maps except the scale maps are normalized.

NormalizeAll 

All maps are normalized.

enum DzSkinBinding::PriorityType

Enumerated priority options for normalization.

Enumerator:
RootLowest 

The root node has the lowest priority when normalizing - i.e. branches get priority when normalizing, so the values of maps closer to the root are more likely to change.

RootHighest 

The root node has the highest priority when normalizing - i.e. the root gets priority when normalizing, so the values of maps closer to the root are less likely to change.

bool DzSkinBinding::isLocal (  ) 

This is a convenience function that can be used to determine if the binding is applied "locally" to each axis of rotation separately, or whether is is applied "globally" using the general map for all rotations.

Returns:
true if the modifier uses individual X, Y and Z rotation weight maps, false if it uses the general map for binding rotation.

Parameters:

Returns:
true if the node is part of a figure with a DzSkinBinding, otherwise false.

DzError DzSkinBinding::normalize ( PriorityType  priority = RootLowest,
NormalizeType  which = NormalizeAll,
bool  respectLocking = false 
) [slot]

Normalizes the maps in the list of bone bindings for this skin binding.

Parameters:
priority Specifies whether the root or the branches should receive the highest priority.
which Specifies which maps should be normalized.
respectLocking Specifies if the normalization process will respect the lock flag on the weight maps.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, otherwise an error code.

short  sectionID,

DzBase *  ptr 
) [virtual]

Called by the framework when reading a native file. Reimplemented from DzModifier. This method will be called with the sectionID and pointerID that were given when writing the file out. The passed pointer may be shared so should not be deleted.

Parameters:

sectionID The ID of the file section being read

void DzSkinBinding::setStorablePaths ( const QString &  path  )  [virtual]

Classes that contain items derived from DzStorable should override this method to give them a chance to set their storage path. The path passed is relative (no leading drive letter or root path). Reimplemented from DzModifier.

Parameters:
path The base path for storables.
